select t0.* ,t1.files ,t2.tags from post t0
left outer join ( select post_id, img_url as files from post_img group by post_id ) t1 on t0.post_id = t1.post_id
left outer join (
SELECT post_id, group_concat(tag) AS tags FROM hashtag GROUP BY post_id ) t2 on t0.post_id = t2.post_id
where del_flag != 1
AND cate_mid_id=#{category_mid}
ORDER BY t0.create_date DESC LIMIT #{sno}, 12
SELECT c1.name AS 'cate_big_name', c2.name AS 'cate_mid_name' FROM category_big c1, category_mid c2 WHERE c1.cate_big_id=c2.cate_big_id AND cate_mid_id = #{category_mid_id}

select t0.*, t1.files, t2.tags, t3.name AS 'cate_big_name', t3.cate_big_id
from post t0
left outer join ( select post_id, img_url as files from post_img group by post_id ) t1 on t0.post_id = t1.post_id
left outer join ( SELECT post_id, group_concat(tag) AS tags FROM hashtag GROUP BY post_id ) t2 on t0.post_id = t2.post_id
INNER JOIN category_mid t3 ON t0.cate_mid_id = t3.cate_mid_id
where del_flag != 1 AND t3.cate_big_id=#{cate_big_id}
ORDER BY t0.create_date DESC LIMIT #{sno}, 12
